Name: Septic Savages
About the game: After encountering an alien creature in a bathroom stall, one man is propelled into a never-ending quest of sewer dwelling carnage! Septic Savages is a 2D, 1 or 2-player, twin-stick shooting roguelike with loads of randomized elements and hours upon hours of gameplay. Thanks to the power of HTML5 and Construct 2 you can try a demo of Septic Savages right now in your browser! Please see the above announcements to give the game a whirl and decide whether or nor it's for you. Game Features 4,320 different powerup combinations! 27 possible difficulty settings, from simple fun to insane brutality! 2 modes of play: an 8 level campaign and endless arcade mode! Play alone or with a friend! Local co-op support for both modes of play. Complete controller support! Bosses, potions, enemies, biomes, random environments, catchy tunes, and more!
Meta Title: Septic Savages: Nov 1, 2016, Jenito and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Septic Savages? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2016), developer insights from Jenito, and a complete game summary.
